content: every dog needs a humiliating hat and this one surely is easy to make the tube is knitted in round and the ears are crocheted feel free to get experimental with this hat idea how about rabbit ears or maybe a fruit basket the possibilities are limitless if you come up with something as funny as this make a pattern for it and submit it to ravelry i m sure i want to knit/crochet it too if you want some good karma you can credit me for the inspiration errata the first double_crochet in the second ear row is of course a chain of 3 ps if your project pic is super cute i send you a request to feature it here on the pattern page pps the pattern refers to minpin it means minuature pincher
